item.label:
The Boncuklu Excavation Module was prepared in 2014 for Dr Andrew Fairbairn, University of Queensland. It is an adaptation of the standard FAIMS Excavation Module, and allows for the single context recording of deposits, which can be grouped into Features.
For more information, see the Boncuklu Excavation Module Guide. It provides an overview of the features and navigation of the Module.
Definitions and vocabulary lists for each Attribute are accessible via the Help button alongside each attribute.

select1.label: Tap Context ID in list below to load it.
Tap Feature in list below to load it.
Tap Sample in list below to load it.

item.label: Here you can group contexts into a single {Context_Group}.

select1.label: Select the Feature to which this {Context} belongs:

input.label: Use this tab to enter relationships between contexts, eg ‘Above’ and ‘Below’. Select the Type of Relationship on the left, the related Context from the list on the right, and click the button ‘Relate Contexts’.

select1.label: Select to Delete or Load the other {Context}

item.label: Here you can enter filenames or unique reference numbers for image stored on another device.

trigger.label: Save and Duplicate {Context} (will not duplicate relationships, samples, or artefacts).

input.label: Use this tab to enter relationships between Features, eg ‘Above’ and ‘Below’. Select the Type of Relationship on the left, the related Feature from the list on the right, and click the button ‘Relate Features'.

item.label: Here you can enter filenames or unique reference numbers for image stored on another device.
